hands."},{"lineNumber":162862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが……魔人……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this... a demon...?\""},{"lineNumber":162863,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまりに情けない鬼の魔人の醜態に、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the pitiful spectacle of the ogre girl...)"},{"lineNumber":162866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レキシントン様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Lexington!\""},{"lineNumber":162867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この！　火爆破ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take this! Fire Explosion!\""},{"lineNumber":162868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah...!\""},{"lineNumber":162869,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックの手前で放たれる魔法。","translatedEnglishLine":"A magic spell was cast right in front of Rick."},{"lineNumber":162870,"originalJapaneseLine":"視界いっぱいに広がる真っ赤な爆発により、","translatedEnglishLine":"A vivid red explosion filled his entire field of vision,"},{"lineNumber":162871,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックの目がくらむ。","translatedEnglishLine":"blinding Rick's eyes."},{"lineNumber":162872,"originalJapaneseLine":"（こちらを狙ったものではない……？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(It wasn't aimed at me...?)"},{"lineNumber":162873,"originalJapaneseLine":"土煙が晴れた頃に見えたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"When the dust cleared,"},{"lineNumber":162874,"originalJapaneseLine":"這々の体で逃げだすレキシントンの姿だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"he saw Lexington crawling away, fleeing."},{"lineNumber":162875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……深追いは禁物、か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Best not to pursue too deeply.\""},{"lineNumber":162876,"originalJapaneseLine":"剣を下ろしリックはとりあえず","translatedEnglishLine":"Lowering his sword, Rick for the moment"},{"lineNumber":162877,"originalJapaneseLine":"この場は勝利で終わったことを実感した。","translatedEnglishLine":"realized that this fight had ended in victory."},{"lineNumber":162878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあっ……はあ、あ、あいつ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... hah, th-that guy...\""},{"lineNumber":162879,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんて、強いの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"How strong he is...\""},{"lineNumber":162880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんてこと言うんです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you saying!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ズドンッッッッ！！！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜BOOMMMMM!!!＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは半身の構えで難なく金棒の一撃を避けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick easily dodged the strike of the metal club with a half-body stance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンの攻撃で地面にクレーターが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Despite the crater forming on the ground from Lexington's attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来上がるのも目に入れず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he paid it no heed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの両手はただ次の攻撃の為に動く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick's hands moved only for the next attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――ッッラァーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Hyaaaaahhh!—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目くらまし目的か、顔を中心に迫る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aimed as a distraction, the slash came rushing toward the face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの斬撃にレキシントンが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Lexington,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界の存在を忘れたように悲鳴を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forgot the presence of his invincible barrier and let out a scream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の攻撃は次の攻撃の為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The current attack was for the next attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の攻撃はその次の次の攻撃の為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the next attack was for the attack after that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬の間断なく放たれる斬撃に魔人は為す術がない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demonic being had no means against the unrelenting slashes fired without a moment's pause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――ぐっ、このぉぉぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Ugh, you bastard!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りに任せ、レキシントンが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Driven by rage, Lexington

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な金棒を横に凪ぎ払った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: swung his huge metal club in a horizontal sweeping strike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの目が光る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick's eyes gleamed.
"—Hmph!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜キキキキンッ！！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜CLING CLING CLING!!＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振るう途中の金棒を下から何度も打ち払い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick repeatedly struck the swinging metal club from below,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金棒の軌道が上方にズレ、空振りをした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing the club's trajectory to shift upwards, resulting in a miss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわ、うわぁぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, ughhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜どすぅ〜〜〜ん！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜THUDDDDD!＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは自らが振るった金棒に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington was spun around by the very club he had swung,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り回されるようにその場で一回転し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: twirling once on the spot as if being swung around by it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地を揺らして尻餅をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shaking the ground as he fell backward onto his rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それを見逃すリックではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And Rick did not miss this opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウララララララァーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Urararararaaaahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目、顔、こめかみ、胸、みぞおち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eyes, face, temples, chest, solar plexus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらに向かってバイ・ロードが振るわれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Road Slash was swung toward all those points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさしく滅多打ち、幾重にも残像を生みながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly a savage beating, creating multiple afterimages,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放たれる真っ赤な斬撃は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the blazing red slashes unleashed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その全てが急所に打たれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all struck vital points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひ、ひぃぃぃーーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Hiiiiyahhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に手をつけばその手が払われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When he placed his hands on the ground, they were brushed away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち上がろうとすれば足を掬われる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and whenever he tried to stand, his feet were swept out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もはや自らでは立つことすら出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was no longer able to stand on his own,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンはただ体を丸めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington simply curled his body up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔だけを両手で覆っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: covering only his face with both hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが……魔人……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this... a demon...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりに情けない鬼の魔人の醜態に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the pitiful spectacle of the ogre demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの攻撃の手が疑問で止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick's offensive hand paused, filled with doubt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まるでただの少女のような……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Like just an ordinary girl...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レキシントン様ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Lexington!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この！　火爆破ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Take this! Fire Explosion!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの手前で放たれる魔法。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A magic spell was cast right in front of Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界いっぱいに広がる真っ赤な爆発により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A vivid red explosion filled his entire field of vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの目がくらむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: blinding Rick's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こちらを狙ったものではない……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It wasn't aimed at me...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 土煙が晴れた頃に見えたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the dust cleared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 這々の体で逃げだすレキシントンの姿だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he saw Lexington crawling away, fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……深追いは禁物、か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Best not to pursue too deeply."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を下ろしリックはとりあえず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lowering his sword, Rick for the moment

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この場は勝利で終わったことを実感した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: realized that this fight had ended in victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあっ……はあ、あ、あいつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... hah, th-that guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんて、強いの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How strong he is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてこと言うんです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you saying!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text: translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ズドンッッッッ！！！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜BOOMMMMM!!!＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは半身の構えで難なく金棒の一撃を避けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick easily dodged the strike of the metal club with a half-body stance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンの攻撃で地面にクレーターが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Despite the crater forming on the ground from Lexington's attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来上がるのも目に入れず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he paid it no heed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの両手はただ次の攻撃の為に動く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick's hands moved only for the next attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――ッッラァーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Hyaaaaahhh!—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目くらまし目的か、顔を中心に迫る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aimed as a distraction, the slash came rushing toward the face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの斬撃にレキシントンが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Lexington,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界の存在を忘れたように悲鳴を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forgot the presence of his invincible barrier and let out a scream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の攻撃は次の攻撃の為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The current attack was for the next attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の攻撃はその次の次の攻撃の為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the next attack was for the attack after that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬の間断なく放たれる斬撃に魔人は為す術がない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demonic being had no means against the unrelenting slashes fired without a moment's pause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――ぐっ、このぉぉぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Ugh, you bastard!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りに任せ、レキシントンが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Driven by rage, Lexington

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な金棒を横に凪ぎ払った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: swung his huge metal club in a horizontal sweeping strike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの目が光る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick's eyes gleamed.
"—Hmph!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜キキキキンッ！！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜CLING CLING CLING!!＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振るう途中の金棒を下から何度も打ち払い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick repeatedly struck the swinging metal club from below,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金棒の軌道が上方にズレ、空振りをした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing the club's trajectory to shift upwards, resulting in a miss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわ、うわぁぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, ughhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜どすぅ〜〜〜ん！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜THUDDDDD!＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは自らが振るった金棒に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington was spun around by the very club he had swung,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り回されるようにその場で一回転し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: twirling once on the spot as if being swung around by it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地を揺らして尻餅をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shaking the ground as he fell backward onto his rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それを見逃すリックではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And Rick did not miss this opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウララララララァーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Urararararaaaahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目、顔、こめかみ、胸、みぞおち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eyes, face, temples, chest, solar plexus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらに向かってバイ・ロードが振るわれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Road Slash was swung toward all those points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさしく滅多打ち、幾重にも残像を生みながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly a savage beating, creating multiple afterimages,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放たれる真っ赤な斬撃は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the blazing red slashes unleashed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その全てが急所に打たれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all struck vital points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひ、ひぃぃぃーーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-Hiiiiyahhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に手をつけばその手が払われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When he placed his hands on the ground, they were brushed away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち上がろうとすれば足を掬われる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and whenever he tried to stand, his feet were swept out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もはや自らでは立つことすら出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was no longer able to stand on his own,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンはただ体を丸めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington simply curled his body up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔だけを両手で覆っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: covering only his face with both hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが……魔人……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this... a demon...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりに情けない鬼の魔人の醜態に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the pitiful spectacle of the ogre demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの攻撃の手が疑問で止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick's offensive hand paused, filled with doubt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （まるでただの少女のような……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Like just an ordinary girl...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レキシントン様ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Lexington!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この！　火爆破ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Take this! Fire Explosion!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの手前で放たれる魔法。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A magic spell was cast right in front of Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界いっぱいに広がる真っ赤な爆発により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A vivid red explosion filled his entire field of vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの目がくらむ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: blinding Rick's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こちらを狙ったものではない……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It wasn't aimed at me...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 土煙が晴れた頃に見えたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the dust cleared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 這々の体で逃げだすレキシントンの姿だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he saw Lexington crawling away, fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……深追いは禁物、か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Best not to pursue too deeply."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を下ろしリックはとりあえず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lowering his sword, Rick for the moment

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この場は勝利で終わったことを実感した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: realized that this fight had ended in victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあっ……はあ、あ、あいつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... hah, th-that guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんて、強いの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How strong he is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてこと言うんです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you saying!"
